quote_first: Seb looked up at the vast black minute hand on the clock that bounced forward every sixty seconds:
quote_last: . Was all the work Cedric had put in going to be for nothing?
title: Be Careful What You Wish For
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: I listened to them, and listened to them again, and then before I had time to figure out what to do, or even what to think or feel, the phone started ringing. It was
quote_last: :27. I looked at the caller ID and saw that it was him.
title: Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close
author: Jonathan Safran Foer
